title: Masterpiece17 Gala
description:
Join the Board of Trustees and the Woman’s Board of the Art Institute of Chicago for the gala event of the year. Funds raised from Masterpiece17 will support the museum’s mission to inspire and educate our community and worldwide audiences.

Saturday, May 6, 2017
7:00 p.m.

Complimentary Valet Parking

Sponsorship Levels
Host Committee: $100,000
Benefactor: $50,000
Patron: $25,000
Supporter: $15,000
Individual Tickets: $1,500 each

For more information or to purchase tickets, contact Kristen Meyer at kmeyer@pjhchicago.com or (312) 553-2000, or visit the event website.
